meanings: bear, (참다) endure tolerate, put up with, (주로 부정문·의문문에 쓰여) stand

vlive.korean: 내가 증오하는 것을 견뎌내라 아닌가? Endure what I hate? 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2019 - EP.66
다 좋아하는 거 같은데 나 형들 나 좋아... - 좀만 견뎌요! I think that everyone likes me but I... - Hold it in more! 듣기 View video CIX : HELLO CIX BEHIND 6 :: 🌱큐티뽀짝 꽁냥파티캠

vlive.korean: 그냥 묵묵해요. - 묵묵 - 묵묵히 버티고 견뎌요. He's a solemn guy. - Solemn. - He just holds it in. 듣기 View video V Special : [Full] 이리와 안아줘 X 앞터V (Come and Hug me X Early Interview)
vlive.english: He's a solemn guy. - Solemn. - He just holds it in.

vlive.korean: 어느 날씨가... - 난 무조건 폭염 못 견뎌요. Which weather do you prefer... - I can't stand hot weather. 듣기 View video 우주소녀(WJSN) : [우주소녀] 처음부터 천일까지 함께해줘서 고마워♥
vlive.english: Which weather do you prefer... - I can't stand hot weather.

vlive.korean: 그러면 이걸 못 견뎌요. I really can’t stand it. 듣기 View video OH MY GIRL : 춥지호??😙

examples.korean: They had withstood siege, hunger and deprivation. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들은 포위 공격, 굶주림, 빈곤을 견뎌 냈었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They had withstood siege, hunger and deprivation. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He soon chafed at the restrictions of his situation. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 이내 자신이 처한 상황에 따르는 구속들에 못 견뎌 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He soon chafed at the restrictions of his situation. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The town survives the onslaught of tourists every summer. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 소도시는 매년 여름 관광객들의 맹습을 견뎌 낸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The town survives the onslaught of tourists every summer. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Modern plastics can stand very high and very low temperatures. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 현대의 플라스틱은 아주 높은 온도와 아주 낮은 온도도 견뎌 낼 수 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Modern plastics can stand very high and very low temperatures. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Many birds didn’t survive the severe winter. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 많은 새들이 그 혹독한 겨울을 견뎌 내지 못했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Many birds didn’t survive the severe winter. Add to Wordbook
